summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for the payment of certain necessary costs and expenses incurred in 1977, or unanticipated at the time of the adopting of the 1978 Budget; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1978 Budget of various City Departments from various City Funds; creating certain positions in various City Departments; making appropriation from the emergency fund and declaring the Emergency therefor; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
